tool.name: Tombo plot most signficant
tool.description: Plotting amperage signal at the locations deemed most significant by the tombo
tool.command:
mkdir -p ./fast5/ && mkdir -p ./fast5s_control/ &&
#if $raw_signals.ext == 'fast5.tar': tar -xf '$raw_signals' -C ./fast5/ && #elif $raw_signals.ext == 'fast5.tar.gz': tar -xzf '$raw_signals' -C ./fast5/ && #elif $raw_signals.ext == 'fast5.tar.bz2': tar -xjf '$raw_signals' -C ./fast5/ && #end if
#if $control_signals.ext == 'fast5.tar': tar -xf '$control_signals' -C ./fast5s_control/ && #elif $control_signals.ext == 'fast5.tar.gz': tar -xzf '$control_signals' -C ./fast5s_control/ && #elif $control_signals.ext == 'fast5.tar.bz2': tar -xjf '$control_signals' -C ./fast5s_control/ && #end if
tombo plot most_significant --fast5-basedir ./fast5/ --control-fast5-basedirs ./fast5s_control/ --statistics-filename '$statistics_file' --plot-standard-model --pdf-filename $output

param.name: statistics_file
param.label: Statistics file to load genomic base anchored statistics

tool.help: Plot most significant regions of difference in amperage signal
